NoticeData.Contents: World Boss Improvements - We are preparing long-term improvements for the World Boss system. The details of these changes will be decided and implemented in collaboration with the community through NCIP. Please stay tuned. - Ahead of these long-term adjustments, we have made short-term changes to enhance the World Boss specs and adjust the percentage of players who can achieve the highest rank. - The stat balance of the 6 Runes (3 Fenrir, 3 Saehrimnir) from the World Boss has been adjusted. Only the stats have been increased, with no changes to skill effects. September Event - The returning Crystal Equipment Event will allow you to embark on your adventures with more crystals than before. - Additionally, throughout September, the Patrol Reward System will offer various rewards to help you continue your exciting adventures. - Detailed information can be found in the Medium announcement. September Season Pass - The Odin’s Treasure Pass, celebrating new Odin-related content in September, will begin. - You can earn the "Odin’s Warrior" title through this Season Pass. - Detailed information can be found in the Medium announcement. Game Improvements - Collection Additions - Added collections for 2 title rewards and 4 costumes from previous Season Passes. - Added a collection for 3 food items from the CITRUS CARNIVAL event dungeon. - Adventure Boss Improvements - Fixed an issue where the reward list for the Adventure Boss challenge and rush was not fully displayed. - Adjusted so that the icon will not be displayed if the NCG reward is 0 or below. - Mobile QR Backup Improvement - Improved the export process by increasing the image size for better recognition. - Fixed an issue where the package name of mobile items purchased on different platforms was not displayed correctly in the mail. Bug Fixes - Fixed a bug where the client displayed results differently from the actual clear results when challenging Adventure Boss. - Fixed a bug where the background would shift up or down during battle simulations.

Item Upgrade Hammer System Added - A system has been added where you can use hammers obtained from Adventure Bosses to add experience during item upgrades. - Hammers can be used to enhance weapons, armor, belts, necklaces, and rings. August Event - The event dungeon 'Citrus Carnival,' which will run throughout August, is now open. - In this dungeon, you can obtain Golden Dust, event-exclusive food, and event medals. - Detailed information will be provided through Medium. August Season Pass - Season Pass 9, which allows you to obtain the title of Bounty Hunter, is now ready. - Season Pass 9 offers more rewards than previous passes, allowing you to get more rewards from Adventure Bosses. Game Improvements - Inventory Improvements - The sorting of the material selection part during enhancement has been improved for practical use. - The sorting order of the material tab has been changed so that hammers can be immediately checked after AP Potions, Hourglasses, and Dusts at the top. - By default, the first sorting is in descending order of rarity, and items of the same rarity are displayed in descending order of CP. - Adventure Boss Improvements - A function to display summary information of the last season during the season progress and the waiting time for the next season has been added. - A feature has been added to show the contribution percentage directly in my information. Bug Fixes - Fixed the issue of infinite loading during World Boss play. - Fixed the issue where the backup function of the maintenance and update guide backup key was not working properly. - Fixed the issue where the number of crystals obtained was not displayed correctly when attempting grinding consecutively.

Adventure Boss System Added - The Adventure Boss System has been added. - Players can become operating users with NCG and receive rewards such as Golden, Ruby, or Emerald Dust, as well as new Critical Rune stones. - Participate in raids using AP Potions and receive rewards like hammers, NCG, dust, and new rune stones. - One random player among the participants will receive 5% of the total operating amount in NCG as a reward. - Participants will share 15% of the operating amount in NCG based on their contribution. - The timing of the Adventure Boss opening is determined by the decentralized participation of players and must be defeated within 4 hours of opening. Once the season ends, it can be reopened after 10,800 blocks. - For more details about the Adventure Boss System, please check the following article: - [Introducing Adventure Boss](https://medium.com/nine-chronicles/9cm-introducing-adventure-boss-eda4712cd2e2) Grimoire Equipment and Summoning System Added - Grimoire equipment, which can be summoned using Emerald Dust, has been added. - The equipment obtained from summoning is non-tradable by default. - A total of 36 types of equipment have been added, comprising 3 skill types, 4 grade levels, and 3 sub-stats. - Grimoire equipment can be equipped in the newly added Grimoire equipment slot. - Emerald Dust can be obtained as operational rewards and raid rewards in the Adventure Boss System. Game Improvements - Equipment Crafting Balance Changes - The crafting experience for Epic, Unique, Legendary, and Sacred grade equipment has been greatly improved. - The crafting cost for premium recipes has been significantly reduced. - The amount of materials required and the waiting blocks generated during crafting have been greatly decreased. - The chance of attaching skills to equipment has been greatly increased. - The amount of crystals needed to unlock recipes has been drastically reduced. - The NCG required to enhance Normal, Rare, Epic, and Unique grade equipment has been reduced by 50%. - Stage Balance Changes - The stats of monsters in Worlds 6, 7, and 8 have been significantly decreased. - Change in World Boss Ranking Calculation Method - To ensure a consistent experience in ranking methods, the World Boss ranking calculation method has been changed to an arena-style system where ties are ranked lower. - The current issue of multiple ties at the S grade level, leading to a lack of distinction in rankings, will be addressed in collaboration with the community this quarter. - Addition of 11 New Collections - New collections have been added, including the newly introduced Emerald Dust and the June Season Pass title-related collections.
